short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stay Active 24/7 by doing nothing. No need to move the cursor anymore !

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Styalive24 will move your cursor all over the screen without any interactions from you. So you can Stay Available in your Skype, Teams or any other tools as long as you want. Styalive24 will prevent your screen from logging off automatically even though when you are away from your system.
